summary: As her 40th birthday approaches, a weather reporter for a local television network encounters various life-defining situations and issues.
cast: Anne-Marie Cadieux|Patrick Baby|Chantal Baril|Jean-François Blanchard|Caroline Bouchard|Frédéric Boudreault|Geneviève Brouillette|Emile Castonguay|Martin Couto|Neil De Albuquerque|Stéphane Demers|Isabelle A. Dupont|Maxime Fournier|Alain Gabriel|Garry Gagnon|Hugo Giroux|Alexandre Goyette|Stéphane F. Jacques|Jennifer Johnston|Renaud Lacelle-Bourdon|Martin Larocque|Gaston Lepage|Mahée Paiement|Béatrice Picard|Frédéric Pierre|Christine Pinard|Sophie Prégent|Patrice Robitaille|Sharlene Royer|Jason Van Asten
title: Miss Météo
